name: notes-app
description: ## User Stories ``` As a programmer I can see a list of my notes, where each note is abbreviated to the first 20 characters So I can find the one I want ``` ``` As a programmer I can create a new note So I can record something I need to remember ``` ``` As a programmer I can see the full text of an individual note on its own page So I can see all the information in the note ```
